sacred_logistics.messages.meteorite: §3It looks like a meteorite is falling somewhere...
sacred_logistics.messages.meteorite_char: §3Looks like the meteorite protection worked! The meteor strike has been cancelled. You're safe. for now.
sacred_logistics.messages.swim: §3I can't swim without fins... I need to get out of here quickly before I drown.
sacred_logistics.messages.fire: §3Damn, it's so hot here... I need a fire glove.
sacred_logistics.messages.cleric: [§bVillager§r] I don't see you wearing %s, I won't trade with you without it!
sacred_logistics.messages.farmer: [§bVillager§r] I won't trade with you until you have %s with you!
sacred_logistics.messages.end: §3I can't go to the End without %s and %s!
sacred_logistics.messages.boss_kill: §3It looks like the world is changing... New resources are now available to you.
sacred_logistics.messages.wither: §3I can't summon the Wither without §6Glowing Water§r.
sacred_logistics.messages.coin: §3I won't fly to other planets without the §6Fortune Coin§r!
sacred_logistics.messages.raid: §3The raid cannot be started without the §6Twilight Cloak§r.
sacred_logistics.messages.monument: §3I can't be near the underwater Monument without %s.
sacred_logistics.messages.gorgon: §3I can't be in the Gorgon Temple without %s and a §6Protective Suit§r (from Mekanism)
sacred_logistics.messages.cataclysm: §3I can't be near this structure without %s.
